name: WORLD HENTAI
description:
The WORLD HENTAI is a set of various casual games with luxury girls as a reward. There are classic Tetris and puzzles of any complexity, ranging from 3x3 and ending at 10x10. Enjoy a pleasant pastime solving a puzzle, admiring cute looks and listening to good music.
In Game:
Cute art works
Gallery with pictures from the completed levels.
Good music
Dynamic Backgrounds
Hints in the form of puzzle pieces numbering (can be turned on and off)
A lot of puzzle modes - from 3x3 (for beginners) and up to 10x10 (for real pros)
Leaderboards
Achievements
A large number of levels

Future:
Collectible Cards
Everyone wants to get a card with a new game, but it needs your support.
The game requires not only your purchases, but also reviews, as well as other activity.
In this project, I put a piece of soul and hope that together we can pass the threshold of the test and
I will be able to please you with collectible cards.
